name: Don't press Rewind
description:
This is a narative type game with VERY simple graphics. But a VERY advanced Story with different paths. I have put a lot of time into the different paths possible when rewinding. Each sentence in the game has at least 5 other variants. If you don't do anything, the game is quite quick (less than 5 minutes) but to unlock all the Endings (8) it will take a bit of researching all the paths.

PLEASE USE HEADPHONES (AUDIO VERY IMPORTANT)

PLEASE LEAVE FEEDBACK ABOUT STORY/BUGS
